website_summaries.verdict: Formulated to deliver comfort with every stride, the Ecco Soft 7 High-Top is like heaven for the feet. The exceptionally soft leather cover insulates the feet during sudden drops of temperature. The world inside provides adequate cushioning that secures the feet from bumps and impact. This reasonably-valued kick is complemented by a moisture-wicking insole which can be replaced by supportive orthotics. It come small and narrow that sizing up is advisable.
pros: Ecco’s Soft 7 High Top felt right in length and width, according to many users
Several reviewers gave this shoe a high rating because they find it very comfortable
It’s convenient to put on and off this shoe, attested by many
This high-top allows room for orthopedic support inserts
According to lots of buyers, walking all day and night with this shoe is pleasurable
A reviewer who uses this shoe around 45 to 50 hours a week is satisfied with its support and shock absorption properties
It provides superior comfort to the feet and up to the lower shin, according to a female reviewer who has gone through several foot surgeries
The padded high upper that surrounds the ankle delivers an adequate amount of support, mentioned by one buyer who transitioned to wearing sneakers after recovering from a foot
A very fashionable and functional cleat sneaker fit for all seasons
This sneaker offers good sole grip, especially when walking on dirt or pebbled roads
The knob pattern on the outsole offers stability and traction on varying surface conditions
It comes with a competitive price considering that it is made of full leather
A devoted Ecco fan finds this shoe excellently constructed and plans to purchase several pairs
Heaps of users recommend this high-top to other potential buyers
It makes the feet look small
This high top shields the feet from light rains
cons: A flat-footed wear tester thought this sneaker needed more arch support

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. Fabulous butter soft leather shoes. Extremely comfortable and hard wearing. Impressed with huge savings from Amazon website . Would definitely recommend these casual boots.
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort footwear
customer_reviews.text: Ecco is my brand for comfortable footwear. I really like the product, although the left foot is a little pressing on my foot and a discomfort. But I love the trainers. I would not hesitate to recommend this site. Moreover, thanks for the speedy delivery
customer_reviews.author: G Fangawa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, and for me are the best of their kind on the market. Great fit, great look and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the shoes, super comfortable. Size did come up a bit larger than expected but not worth replacing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: this is my 4th soft 7 boots bought from amazon for my family. love its quality.previous 3 is made in Slovakia and latest is made in Thai.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dong

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them , very comfortable Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these and the leather is very soft and comfy. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable and nice to walk in
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and nice to walk in! - This is my first pair of Ecco shoes and I'm impressed! Good quality, feel and design
customer_reviews.author: ANDY123

customer_reviews.title: Happy Chap
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes bought a brown pair then the black ones very difficult to get size 13 smart casual shoes! Over the moon!
customer_reviews.author: david hill

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: Not the cheapest but a great hi-top casual shoe, made with very soft leather and very comfortable on the feet. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them.Comfy,fab design and got a black ones.Good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: zibbyk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best shoes ever purchased will buy again when these eventually wear out
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Penelope Richey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, they are EU sizes I ordered 11 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, they are EU sizes I ordered 11 uk on site and got EU45 instead of EU46 (uk12 on size choice) but swapped them and happy with shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! so glad i bought them. really good quality and super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of my Ecco soft men hi top.It fits just I expected
customer_reviews.author: Crucifix

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. They fit perfectly well and are easy to put on too (there's a clever cutout on the back of the boot around the Achilles heel area that helps you get the boot on and off). They're mega comfy and look pretty cool too. Best of all, these were a hell of a lot cheaper from Amazon than they were from the Ecco shops in London. They look great with black or grey skinny jeans, are really well made, quite cool/designer looking too, despite being from what some people might think to be an "older person's brand".
customer_reviews.author: D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Totally nice
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and perfect fit.the leather is soft and smooth.despite several little problems it is still wanderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Soft 7 Sneaker
product_meta.description: Go retro with this vintage look hi-top sneaker that manages to pack in some up-to-date comfort features too. The soft leather wraps around the foot thanks to the anatomical design, while internal technology includes the unique Ecco comfort fibre system for all-day freshness. Ecco’s core values, the soft seven sneaker is a celebration of Scandinavian design with an understated, contemporary twist.
feature_bullets: Uppers made of rich full grain leather and suede for a light and soft feel
Full anatomical last shape provides a supremely comfortable fit
Removable leather covered inlay sole with ECCO Comfort Fibre System
